title: 暑假已经过半
txt_content: 暑假已经过半，小伙伴们作业完成了吗

replies.author: 梦戟殇牵挂
replies.txt_content: 表示高考党没有作业

replies.author: 黑贞
replies.txt_content: 你是魔鬼吗

replies.author: 快乐小方
replies.txt_content: 刚中考完，没作业

replies.author: huang_风雨
replies.txt_content: 没作业

replies.author: Drand
replies.txt_content: 很可惜 没有作业 233

replies.author: west.myth
replies.txt_content: 同上，没有作业。你作业写完了吗？

replies.author: 小孩孩
replies.txt_content: 为什么都没作业，这是要让我绝望吗？

replies.author: 卫斯李
replies.txt_content:
羡慕啊 好想上学 
上班太累

replies.txt_content: 你是魔鬼吗 兄弟

replies.txt_content: 社会实践的任务比较多，作业给免掉了

replies.author: 银风000
replies.txt_content: 中考党没有作业，但补课有点多.........

replies.author: kingking53
replies.txt_content: 你们都是魔鬼

replies.author: hua_ji_guai
replies.txt_content: 高考考完  没作业 哈哈哈！

replies.author: pixelgear
replies.txt_content: 暑假即将结束

replies.author: Sinbad_Official
replies.txt_content: 没有作业，你写完了么？

replies.author: Kastoo
replies.txt_content: 啊啊啊收声啊啊啊啊啊

replies.author: Black_Pears
replies.txt_content: 为何要提这种令人不愉快的事

replies.author: 星☆光
replies.txt_content: 额，能否别说暑假过了多少，说的我心慌

replies.txt_content: 已经过了一月了

replies.author: 咸鱼坊
replies.txt_content: 你跟大学生说作业吗？

replies.txt_content:
暑假还有2天（这还是延长以后的）
作业一点没动（滑稽

replies.txt_content:
然而我的暑假才刚刚开始...
反正我不急
